an3.121:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, abrahmacariyā paṭivirato hoti.
an3.121:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti.
an3.121:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ:
an3.121:6.6: yathā ca anuppannassa kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.7: yathā ca uppannassa kāmacchandassa pahānaṃ hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.8: yathā ca pahīnassa kāmacchandassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.13: yathā ca anuppannassa byāpādassa uppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.14: yathā ca uppannassa byāpādassa pahānaṃ hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.15: yathā ca pahīnassa byāpādassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.20: yathā ca anuppannassa thinamiddhassa uppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.21: yathā ca uppannassa thinamiddhassa pahānaṃ hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.22: yathā ca pahīnassa thinamiddhassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.27: yathā ca anuppannassa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.28: yathā ca uppannassa uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānaṃ hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.29: yathā ca pahīnassa uddhaccakukkuccassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.34: yathā ca anuppannāya vicikicchāya uppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.35: yathā ca uppannāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ hoti, tañca pajānāti;
an3.121:6.36: yathā ca pahīnāya vicikicchāya āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti, tañca pajānāti.
